name: NYDailyNews
text:
Brooklyn Federal Court won't hold in-person hearings due to the resurgence of the COVID-19 pandemic in NYC.

https://t.co/VImMsKRu92

name: NYDailyNews
text:
More than 111,000 NYC students were homeless last school year. 

It's the fifth consecutive year more than 100,000 public school families have gone without stable housing, according to a report.

https://t.co/qRRCCeD0nt

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @snydenydn: Radio Disney will shut down amid ongoing restructuring at Disney. 

The radio station launched in 1996 and helped propel the careers of Miley Cyrus, Selena Gomez, Raven-Symon√© and Taylor Swift.

https://t.co/xUcORGIREu

name: NYDailyNews
text:
A Texas restaurant server who received a $2,000 tip from a generous couple finally got her money. 

The tip was delayed because the bank wouldn't process a tip that large on a credit card. The server, a struggling mom, said she's spending it on her kids.

https://t.co/AJt2YCRSGp

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Steve Adler, mayor of Austin, Texas, apologized for flying to Mexico in early November as coronavirus spread rapidly through the state.

https://t.co/n8n83IXp4l

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Walmart will give out a fourth round of pandemic-related bonuses to its 1.5 million U.S. employees. 

https://t.co/96AnBDVUyD

name: NYDailyNews
text:
A Toronto bar in danger of shuttering was saved when customers bought its entire supply of beer. 

The bar typically has 70-100 cases of beer at all times. 

https://t.co/v9zf5kiDg7
